name: event-survey-app
description: Full-stack event survey web application - Simplified 2-container architecture

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=web && npm run build --workspace=api
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=api && npm run test --workspace=web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=api && npm run lint --workspace=web
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=api && npm run format --workspace=web
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker-compose down && docker-compose build && docker-compose up -d
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=web && npm run clean --workspace=api && rm -f docker-build*.log final-build.log
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf web/dist api/dist
